title: Pro Days Continue, Matt Ryan speaks, Baker Mayfield limited options, and NFL Rankings
itunes:title: Pro Days Continue, Matt Ryan speaks, Baker Mayfield limited options, and NFL Rankings
description:
The latest edition of The Good Morning Football Podcast covers Pro Days before the NFL Draft and reaction to the latest free agency moves.  Hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Tom Pelissero, and Fmr Pro Bowl RB Maurice Jones-Drew ask if a team will find their starting QB in this Draft.  What will Matt Ryan's future hold with the Colts and could Carolina and Seattle be the only remaining options for Baker Mayfield?  The crew is looking forward to Matt Corral's Pro Day today because he could be an x factor for a team.  Plus, we have early NFL Rankings and want to know why some teams are ranked higher or lower than they should be.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:keywords: Sports, NFL, NFL Draft, NFL Combine, Pro Days, Malik Willis, Matt Ryan, Indianapolis Colts, Atlanta Falcons, Baker Mayfield, Carolina Panthers, Seattle Seahawks, Pete Carroll, Russell Wilson, Matt Corral, Les Snead, Los Angeles Rams, Aaron Donald, San Francisco 49ers, Tennessee Titans, Las Vegas Raiders, Derek Carr, Cleveland Browns, Deshaun Watson, Trey Lance, Jimmy Garoppolo
